from skimage import io
import numpy as np
import cv2

from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
source.627cabe5:
def augment_and_show(aug, image):
    image = aug(image=image)['image']
    
    plt.figure(figsize=(12, 10))
    plt.imshow(image)

augment_and_show(img_rain, image)
